evidence: Abstract Mixture modelling is a standard technique for density estimation , but its use in sta tistical machine translation ( SMT ) has just started to be explored .
text: Abstract Mixture modelling is a standard technique for density estimation , but its use in sta tistical machine translation ( SMT ) has just started to be explored .

evidence: Experiments carried out on the Europarl and News Commentary corpora show the potential interest and limi tations of mixture modelling .
